languages.text: {n}Ворон взмывает в воздух. Черным вихрем он проносится мимо каждого прорыва, и его крылья, повинуясь вашей воле, отражают жуткое сияние непознаваемого обратно в самое себя. Спустя несколько напряженных минут от ловушек не остается и следа.{/n}

{n}The raven soars. It sweeps past breach after breach like a black whirlwind, and its wings do your bidding as they reflect the terrifying glow of the unknowable back onto itself. Several tense minutes later, nothing remains of the traps.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ворон взмывает в воздух. Черным вихрем он проносится мимо каждого прорыва, и его крылья, повинуясь вашей воле, отражают жуткое сияние непознаваемого обратно в самое себя. Спустя несколько напряженных минут от ловушек не остается и следа.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The raven soars. It sweeps past breach after breach like a black whirlwind, and its wings do your bidding as they reflect the terrifying glow of the unknowable back onto itself. Several tense minutes later, nothing is left of the traps.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Rabe steigt auf. Er fliegt wie ein schwarzer Wirbelwind von Riss zu Riss, und seine Flügel reflektieren das schreckliche Leuchten des Unergründlichen auf sich selbst zurück. Einige angespannte Minuten später ist von den Fallen nichts mehr übrig.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The raven soars. It sweeps past breach after breach like a black whirlwind, and its wings do your bidding as they reflect the terrifying glow of the unknowable back onto itself. Several tense minutes later, nothing remains of the traps.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Rabe steigt auf. Er fliegt wie ein schwarzer Wirbelwind von Riss zu Riss, und seine Flügel reflektieren das schreckliche Leuchten des Unergründlichen auf sich selbst zurück. Einige angespannte Minuten später ist von den Fallen nichts mehr übrig.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La corneille prend son envol. Elle se rue de fracture en fracture comme un tourbillon noir et ses ailes accomplissent votre volonté en réfléchissant la lueur terrifiante de l'insondable sur elle-même. Au bout de plusieurs minutes d'attente anxieuse, il ne reste rien des pièges.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The raven soars. It sweeps past breach after breach like a black whirlwind, and its wings do your bidding as they reflect the terrifying glow of the unknowable back onto itself. Several tense minutes later, nothing remains of the traps.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La corneille prend son envol. Elle se rue de fracture en fracture comme un tourbillon noir et ses ailes accomplissent votre volonté en réfléchissant la lueur terrifiante de l'insondable sur elle-même. Au bout de plusieurs minutes d'attente anxieuse, il ne reste rien des pièges.{/n}

languages.text: {n}渡鸦飞到空中，仿佛黑色的旋风一样，掠过了一个又一个裂隙。它按照你的命令拍打着翅膀，将那些神秘莫测的可怕光芒反射回了自己身上。紧张的几分钟过后，所有陷阱都被拆除了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The raven soars. It sweeps past breach after breach like a black whirlwind, and its wings do your bidding as they reflect the terrifying glow of the unknowable back onto itself. Several tense minutes later, nothing remains of the traps.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}渡鸦飞到空中，仿佛黑色的旋风一样，掠过了一个又一个裂隙。它按照你的命令拍打着翅膀，将那些神秘莫测的可怕光芒反射回了自己身上。紧张的几分钟过后，所有陷阱都被拆除了。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El cuervo alza el vuelo. Atraviesa brecha tras brecha como un remolino negro, y sus alas cumplen tus órdenes, reflejando el aterrador resplandor de lo incognoscible de vuelta a su dimensión. Después de unos minutos de tensión, no queda rastro de las trampas.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The raven soars. It sweeps past breach after breach like a black whirlwind, and its wings do your bidding as they reflect the terrifying glow of the unknowable back onto itself. Several tense minutes later, nothing remains of the traps.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El cuervo alza el vuelo. Atraviesa brecha tras brecha como un remolino negro, y sus alas cumplen tus órdenes, reflejando el aterrador resplandor de lo incognoscible de vuelta a su dimensión. Después de unos minutos de tensión, no queda rastro de las trampas.{/n}

languages.text: {n}レイヴンは舞い上がった。黒い旋風のように次々と裂け目をかすめた。その翼はあなたの命令に従い、未知の恐怖の輝きを自身に反射させる。数分の緊迫した時間の後、罠は跡形もなく消え去った。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The raven soars. It sweeps past breach after breach like a black whirlwind, and its wings do your bidding as they reflect the terrifying glow of the unknowable back onto itself. Several tense minutes later, nothing remains of the traps.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}レイヴンは舞い上がった。黒い旋風のように次々と裂け目をかすめた。その翼はあなたの命令に従い、未知の恐怖の輝きを自身に反射させる。数分の緊迫した時間の後、罠は跡形もなく消え去った。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kuzgun havalanıyor. Kara bir kasırga misali yarıktan yarığa süzülüyor, kanatları emrini icra ederken bilinmezliğin ürpertici parıltısını kendine çarptırıyor. Gergin birkaç dakikanın ardından tuzaklardan geriye zerre kalmıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The raven soars. It sweeps past breach after breach like a black whirlwind, and its wings do your bidding as they reflect the terrifying glow of the unknowable back onto itself. Several tense minutes later, nothing remains of the traps.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Kuzgun havalanır. Kara bir kasırga misali yarıktan yarığa süzülür, kanatları emrini icra ederken bilinmezliğin ürpertici parıltısını kendine çarptırır. Gergin birkaç dakikanın ardından tuzaklardan geriye zerre kalmaz.{/n}
